data.title: Fantastic production of Frankenstein
data.text:
We were just passing through town looking for something to do and stumbled across this play on TripAdvisor.

What a great group of actors and actresses that told a rather sad story of Frankenstein, sprinkled with bits of humor, mixed with suspense!

I love the small theater in the round style of stage.

After the play they had a question and answer time with all the actors, actresses and stage personnel.  Very talented people who seem to really love their work!!

Very enjoyable evening. I wish I lived here as I would be in the front row for all their performances.

data.title: Very talented people!
data.text: This community theater offers all sorts of productions, all the way from One Flew Over the Cookoo's Nest to a Christmas play with Laura Ingalls WIlder, presented by children.

data.title: Great Community Theater
data.text: This theater has a charming intimacy of being small and in the round. It would be worth looking up as you visit Casper to see if they have a performance while you are in town.  Prices are very reasonable.  This makes for a pleasant evening out!

data.title: A Rose Amoung Thorns! Stage III is a great community theater...
data.text: Stage III had been producing excellent community theater for decades and continue to produce hits. Whether it's a comedy, Shakespeare, a contemporary drama or homegrown productions, this theater group's volunteer thespians represent many of Central Wyoming's finest actors. Their productions are staged in the round,  in their own building located on North Center Street, very near most all of the major hotels in Casper.  The troupe presents six to seven shows a year with productions running generally from September to June. If you happen onto this happy little group you will not be disappointed!

data.title: Never dull.
data.text: What a great Casper Tradition.  So much fun and always entertaining.  No two performances are exactly the same as it is live and, sometimes, interactive.  Never been to a bad performance.  Go and be entertained.

data.title: Great little theatre group with wide variety of plays makes it worthwhile
data.text: Love this group. Some plays better than others but all are fun and the price is reasonable.  A fun experience every time!
